attributes.action: Abolish charges for garden waste collections
attributes.additional_details: We all ready pay £1700 per year in council tax and to charge more for garden waste is disgusting. We already pay enough it's just going to promote fly tipping or a charge at council tips this is wrong.
attributes.background: Abolish charges for garden waste collections from Kent council and all councils in the uk

rejection.details: Waste management is devolved, so it is up to individual local authorities how to manage this, and whether to impose any charges, not the Government or Parliament.
